derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French séduction or Latin seductio(n-), from seducere 'draw aside' (see seduce)

entry.def: If something seduces you, it is so attractive that it makes you do something that you would not otherwise do.

example.ex: The view of lake and plunging cliffs seduces visitors...
example.tran: 湖光旖旎、峭壁峥嵘，游客们被深深吸引了。

example.ex: Clever advertising would seduce more people into smoking.
example.tran: 巧妙策划的广告会引诱更多的人吸烟。

entry.def: If someone seduces another person, they use their charm to persuade that person to have sex with them.

example.ex: She has set out to seduce Stephen.
example.tran: 她已经开始勾引斯蒂芬了。

means.word_mean: 1. enticing someone astray from right behavior
2. an act of winning the love or sexual favor of someone

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易拉长的,易变形的,可塑的
stems_affixes.word_buile: duct引导,带来+ile能……的→能引导的→可塑的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产[性]的,能产的,多产的
stems_affixes.word_buile: product[n.产品,产物;乘积]+ive……的→adj.生产[性]的,能产的,多产的
via路+duct引导,带来→引导路的路
con共同+duct引导,带来→引导大家一起指挥

stems_affixes.value_cn: 管理者;[汽车]售票员;领队,指挥;导体
stems_affixes.word_buile: conduct引导;管理;指挥[乐队];传导+or人或物器→n.管理者;[汽车]售票员;领队,指挥;导体

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引出, 排出, 推断, 引出物
stems_affixes.word_buile: educt=educe[v.引出;演绎]+ion表名词→n.引出, 排出, 推断, 引出物
product[n.产品,产物;乘积]+ivity表名词→n.生产率
seduct=seduce[v.勾引,诱惑]+ion动作或状态→n.诱惑
vent风,通风+i+duct引导,带来→引导通风

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引导;管理;指挥[乐队];传导
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+duct引导,带来→引导大家一起指挥
in进入+duct引导,带来→引进→引导
